thread.title: Jamie Dornan Has a Funny Trick for Filming 'Fifty Shades' Sex Scenes
thread.title_full: Jamie Dornan Has a Funny Trick for Filming 'Fifty Shades' Sex Scenes

title: Jamie Dornan Has a Funny Trick for Filming 'Fifty Shades' Sex Scenes
text:
Jamie Dornan Has a Funny Trick for Filming 'Fifty Shades' Sex Scenes Maressa Brown 
BBC If I had to guess which question Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson are fed up with being asked while doing press for Fifty Shades , it would have to be, "What's it like filming all those naughty sex scenes?" (Kind of ironic, being that a lot of fans griped that the first flick couldn't even get close to flirting with an X rating.) Really, that's all anyone seems to ask them, ever. So, of course the topic was broached when Dornan was on The Graham Norton Show in the UK, but this time, the conversation took a really entertaining, downright silly turn. 
Norton said that this installment is actually more romantic than the first, and Dornan agreed but said there is more sex this time around, too. (Whoohoo!) So, he preemptively broached the topic! Then, he explained a little bit of the process. 
When fellow guest Keanu Reeves asked him to clarify what kind of direction he gets on "vocalization," Dornan explained, "My temptation is always just to try to make Dakota laugh. So sometimes I'll do things like, when there's a moment where Iâ€™m meant to orgasm, I'll be like, 'do-do-do do do-do.' As in like a little trumpet noise. Ahahahaha. 
More from CafeMom: Dakota Johnson & Jamie Dornan's On-Set Workouts Sound as Intense as Their Sex Scenes 
The moment was genuinely so cute and funny. Check it out. Now, when you're watching those steamy sex scenes, this is totally going to pop into your head, and whoever you watch it with is may wonder why you're randomly laughing out loud at Christian and Ana getting it on. Ah well! The fact that they can laugh at themselves is refreshing. And admit it, Dornan's rando goofiness only serves to make him more attractive.
